mapper.sql: id, filen_name AS filenName, create_date AS createDate, receive_date AS receiveDate, email_id AS emailId, process_result AS processResult
mapper.select: select b.email, a.id, a.file_name as fileName, a.create_date as createDate, a.receive_date as receiveDate, a.email_id as emailId, a.process_result as processResult from credit_file a join credit_email b on a.email_id = b.id where a.process_result != 1
